item.title: Reinschauer: Remotely Controlling Windows Machines
item.description: Recently, I did some research on Hidden VNCs (HVNC). This is a neat feature for attackers to have, since it allows to remotely control a compromised system on a new and separate virtual desktop that is not visible to the victim. This way, it is possible to remotely launch and use GUI programs without generating any visual indicators for victims. Implementing HVNC is complicated. First of all, you need to be able to grab the screen contents of the hidden desktop.
